reviewText: David Letterman is an institution on television.  He has moved networks and that is part of the problem.  One cannot expect rival networks to promote each other's work.  If you are a fan of Letterman, then the NBC days are gone and soon to be forgotten.  This set of Anniversary Specials allows you to view again, some of the things that made him a late night staple. Even the medium, VHS, speaks of its authenticity.
